content.question: A map of equipotential lines for a system of point charges is shown in the figure, where the potential difference is the same between each pair of adjacent lines. What is the magnitude of the potential difference between points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
